The Book of Lost Tales Part One

wikitext.*:
'''Mablon''' the Ilkorin was an [[Elf]] of the [[Elder Days]]. He was noted for his self-sacrifice in the [[Battle of Unnumbered Tears]] when he challenged a host of [[Balrogs]] to save the remainders of his people.<ref>{{LT1|X}}, p. 274</ref>
